title: Building Editor: Individual walls manipulable, bounding box select buggy for building with default name

content.raw:
After saving a building with the default name and exiting the Building Editor, you can select individual walls and stairs and manipulate the individual components in translate/rotate/scale mode.

If you select the buggy building in the World tab, the building will not be highlighted with a bounding box. Similarly, if you select the building in the main window, the bounding box will render but the name will not be highlighted in the World tab. Also, turning the bounding box is buggy.

Appears to be related to issue #1351 (the crash described in #1351 is reproducible if you delete the buggy building described above then re-open the Building Editor and try to draw walls).
